Years later, A Mai, now a young woman, disguises herself as a man and roams the martial world, seeking revenge against Chen Qi.

Nila and Rusdi were forced to leave their luxurious house and decided to return to the village because Rusdi's assets were still there in the form of a vegetable plantation. Upon arriving at the vegetable garden, Nila met a cute rabbit owned by Damar. Nila and Damar became acquainted. Knowing that Nila was Rusdi's child, Damar was angry.

programme.title: Sisain Kembang Desa Kayak Gini Satu Aja
programme.desc: Alex is the largest donor to the orphanage. Zahra asks the orphanage's mother for permission to move to Jakarta. Upon arriving in Jakarta, Zahra is offered a job at someone's house in Jakarta. It turns out the house belongs to Alex.

programme.title: MAKAN TEROOOS - EP 18
programme.desc: Explore culinary references that serve authentic flavors. Follow the culinary adventure of Indonesia only at Makan Terooos.

programme.title: MAD ABOUT - EP 22
programme.desc: A semi documentary magazine that show the world of hobbies and interest

programme.title: NAWAITU SURGA 2022 - EP 23
programme.desc: New Version of Nawaitu Surga which is program that teaches about behavior in life through the guidance of a leading Ustad

programme.title: BINTANG PANTURA 5 - EP 21
programme.desc: The Pantura Bintang Stage is back looking for Bintang. Excitement, cuteness, rocking each other to become a star.

programme.title: Perempuan Tidak Bercerita TibaTiba Idola
programme.desc: A beautiful girl named Mika. It is said that Mika, who is a member of a motorcycle gang, suddenly becomes the target of slander and makes her have to run away or disguise herself. Finally, Mika disguises herself as a principal at an elementary school, with the new name Laila. Actually, the principal named Laila has died. Then Mika takes the opportunity to disguise herself.

programme.title: Awal Mulanya Gimana Mba Taylor?
programme.desc: Jojo accidentally meets Laras, who ran away because she couldn't pay the bus fare. It turns out Laras' money is missing. Laras runs and meets Jojo. Laras immediately gets into Jojo's car to escape. Finally, Laras admits to being a telecommuter.

programme.title: BINTANG PANTURA 5 - EP 21
programme.desc: The Pantura Bintang Stage is back looking for Bintang. Excitement, cuteness, rocking each other to become a star.

programme.title: BY THE WAY - EP 2
programme.desc: Talkshow that shows fun talk with guest stars.

programme.title: PARA PENCARI TUHAN 17 - EP 23
programme.desc: With the theme of Heaven's Fugitive, Bang Jack has to deal with debt collectors who have minimal religious knowledge to teach them to become sharia-compliant debt collectors.

programme.title: Oppa Koreya Bikin Aku Bilang Ya Ya Ya
programme.desc: Dina really likes everything about Korea. This includes dreaming of a handsome prince or husband from Korea, or a Korean Oppa. However, it is later revealed that Dina is actually engaged to a guy chosen by her mother. Suddenly, Dina says that she wants to change her future husband to a Korean Oppa named Oppa Lie.

programme.title: CINTA SUCI - EP 21
programme.desc: Suci, who is entangled in problems, must marry Marcel because she desperately needs money for the medical expenses of her husband and children, Aditya and Ronny, so that they can both stay alive. On the other hand, Monica hates Suci because she thinks Suci forced Marcel to marry her.

programme.title: Prince Si Pahit Lidah
programme.desc: After Prince regained consciousness from his coma, he discovered that his fiancée, Laras, had married his best friend, Fathir, who was responsible for his accident. Confused, Prince tried to understand this betrayal, following a series of events that revealed intrigue, the pain of love, and threats to Laras and Fathir's new marriage.

programme.title: Samudra Cinta - EP 475
programme.desc: The love story between Ocean and Cinta, which had always quarreled before. Gradually, they became friends and slowly grew in love between them. But a secret between the Cinta family and the Samudra family makes their relationship complicated because there is a big secret about Cinta that can ruin their relationship.

programme.title: CINTA AMARA - EP 149
programme.desc: An engineered tragedy left 6-month-old Aziza separated from her mother. However, the baby was rescued by her grandfather and taken as far away as possible, so that her granddaughter would have no further contact with the Nirwan family, the kayakers who own a famous bakery company. Burhan, the baby's grandfather entrusted his granddaughter to his confidant, whose wife was pregnant.

programme.title: HEMPASKAN MANTAN NANNY PUN DATANG
programme.desc: Because she didn't want to be set up in a marriage, Fika ran away from home and lived with Dea without Andre's knowledge. However, Andre eventually found out. Dea and Fika begged Andre to let Fika stay. Andre gave in, on the condition that Fika become a maid in the house and also a nanny.

programme.title: Money Back Guarantee
programme.desc: A simple man is tricked by a cunning self-proclaimed guru. With his life in chaos, he turns to his friends for help and together they try to escape the mess. Release Year: 2016 Director: Sunil Pal

programme.title: Parmanu - The Story Of Pokhran
programme.desc: A look at India's second confidential nuclear test series at Pokhran led by Dr. APJ Abdul Kalam, during the time of PM Atal Bihari Vajpayee's tenure. Release Year: 2018 Director: Abhishek Sharma

programme.title: Mard Ko Dard Nahi Hota
programme.desc: Surya has a lifelong condition that renders him unable to feel or register pain. Soon, he decides to learn martial arts and use his abilities to help his biggest idol. Release Year: 2018 Director: Vasan Bala

programme.title: Jaal: The Trap
programme.desc: To save his kidnapped girlfriend Neha from terrorists, Ajay is forced to abduct the home minister's daughter, Anita, only to uncover a shocking truth behind the plot. Release Year: 2003 Director: Guddu Dhanoa

programme.title: Alone
programme.desc: Two twin sisters who lived by one promise - 'We will always be together. We will never separate'. Later, the ghost of dead haunt the surviving sister. Release Year: 2015 Director: Bhushan Patel

programme.title: Ab Tumhare Hawale Watan Saathiyo
programme.desc: Kunal is in love with Shweta, whos waiting for her husband Rajeev to return from war. Kunal is torn between his love for Shweta and his duty as a soldier. Release Year: 2004 Director: Anil Sharma

programme.title: Khamoshi
programme.desc: A young woman, who lives alone and has a speech and hearing disability, attempts to save herself when a killer appears at her doorstep. Release Year: 2019 Director: Chakri Toleti

programme.title: Awarapan
programme.desc: Shivam, a hitman, is asked to keep an eye on his boss's mistress. However, he soon learns that she has been a victim of sex trafficking and decides to unite her with her lover. Release Year: 2007 Director: Mohit Suri

programme.title: Agni (2024)
programme.desc: In a city plagued by a strange rise in fires, fireman Vithal and his policeman brother-in-law Samit reluctantly team up to solve the escalating crisis. Battling personal conflicts, they race against time to crack the case and save Mumbai. Release Year: 20

programme.title: Acharya
programme.desc: Enraged by the murders committed by the municipal leader of Dharmasthali, Acharya, a social reformer, vows to take revenge for his friend, Siddha. Fights and corruption ensue as secrets get revealed.

programme.title: Don Aur Doctor

programme.title: Alone

programme.desc: When a singer disappears during a serial killer spree, a taxidriver and a businessman's son cross paths in a disturbing tale where the lines between good and evil are blurred.

programme.title: Poongodi

programme.title: Punitha
programme.desc: Maragatham holds her step-daughter Punitha dear, to the point of being overbearing. However, their bond turns twisted & burdened when Punitha finds her soulmate, Kabilan. Amidst family betrayals, can Punitha show her mother the true meaning of love?

programme.title: MANAMAGALE VAA
programme.desc: Narmada's mission to her ancestral village to reunite her father & his estranged family entwines with Kathir's task of finding suitable grooms for his three sisters. What unfolds when they fall in love, striving for a cause against the same enemy?

programme.title: VINODHINI
programme.desc: When her husband, a soldier, disappears in a military accident, Vinothini never loses hope, firmly believing he'll come back. Join her inspiring journey as she cares for his family & meets life's hardships as a single mother with resilience & love

programme.title: PUTHU VASANTHAM

programme.title: Le Monde D'hier
programme.desc: Three days before the first round of the presidential election, elizabeth de Raincy, President of the Republic, wants to retire from politics. But Franck L'Herbier, Secretary General of the elysee Palace, tells her that a foreign scandal from is likely to hand victory to the far-right candidate.

programme.title: Les Belles Cicatrices
programme.desc: Gaspard is still in love with Leila. One month after she left him, they meet again in a crowded bar. As the reunion goes badly, Gaspard hides under the table.

programme.title: Nous Les Griots
programme.desc: Malik, Daouda's eldest son, wants to marry Mariama. But when a meeting between the two families, both originally from Senegal, is organised over a meal, Daouda discovers that they are from two very different social classes. His family is ''griot''; Mariama's is noble.

programme.title: Fred L'handicape - EP 1
programme.desc: Fred ends up paralysed after breaking two vertebrae in an accident. How will his relationship with Myriam change following the tragedy and all its challenges?

programme.title: Fred L'handicape - EP 2
programme.desc: Life in hospital is starting to get him down. Fred relies heavily on friends and family, and his medical team. But when life is at its darkest, a new arrival in his life offers a glimmer of hope.

programme.title: Fred L'handicape - EP 3
programme.desc: Fred is perfectly aware that he'll have to live with his disability for the rest of his life. Will he have the courage to get back up on the improvisation stage?

programme.title: Fred L'handicape - EP 4
programme.desc: A ''making of'' takes us behind the scenes with the series' actors, author and director.

programme.title: Au Bout De L'enquete, La Fin Du Crime Parfait ?
programme.desc: They are all cases that were closed, considered unsolvable, sometimes resisting police efforts for decades until a forgotten clue, an unhoped-for witness or a forensic innovation finally made it possible to unmask the culprit. Alongside Marie Drucker, the criminologist Alain Bauer explains the technical, psychological, sociological or historical elements involved.

programme.title: Littoral - EP 16
programme.desc: The 'Grain de Sail' is a one-of-a-kind cargo sailboat. From Saint-Malo to New York, it transports 50 tons of wine, coffee and chocolate. Jacques and Olivier Barreau are behind this initiative and have chosen carbon-neutral maritime transport, all by the force of the wind.

Between romance and crime thriller, with a blend of comic and serious themes, their stories weave a fascinating web.

programme.title: Ding Dong : Montre-Moi Ta Maison ! - EP 10
programme.desc: Visit to an incredible loft on the top floor of a former factory renovated into flats. Then direction the Grisons to visit the house of a couple of art-lovers who regularly invite artists to repaint the walls of their home.

programme.title: Tendance XXI - EP 25
programme.desc: French creativity is booming in the fields of fashion, crafts, design, beauty and gastronomy. 'Tendance XXI' showcases a know-how that evolves in tune with the times, sometimes even anticipating them.

programme.title: Slam

programme.title: Le Telejournal De Radio-Canada
programme.desc: The televised news programme from the Radio-Canada team.

programme.title: Chroniques D'en Haut
programme.desc: A magazine programme devoted to the mountains. An opportunity to explore a rich and fascinating world and take a sumptuous journey through the heart of the most beautiful landscapes of the Auvergne-Rhone-Alpes region.

programme.title: Rocky & Lily : C'est Dans La Boite ! - EP 3
programme.desc: Every day, Rocky and Lily receive a new box on the set. But what does it contain? It's always a surprising object that leads them to discover very different subjects: turtles, bowling or even cloud formation.

programme.title: Gigantosaurus - EP 7
programme.desc: Four little dinosaurs, Rocky, Bill, Tiny and Mazu, discover a dangerous world where the mysterious Gigantosaurus, the most ferocious of all the dinosaurs, is forever on the prowl. The four best friends set their heading for adventure, confronting their fears and working together to solve all their problems.

programme.title: Yetili - EP 20
programme.desc: Nina and Leon, two little mice, live in a bookshop whose mascot is a large yeti cuddly toy called Yetili. Each evening, once the bookshop has closed, Yetili comes to life and settles his two friends on his knees to read them a story.

programme.title: Dessine Les Animaux Avec Koumi - EP 37
programme.desc: Koumi is 6 years old, mischievous and always full of fun. The dream of her life is to know all the animals of the world, and she absolutely loves drawing! In each episode she explains how to draw animals really well.

programme.title: La Petite Pokou - EP 13
programme.desc: Kongouet Bian is happy that Aza Yah is dead. Pokou joins her friends and they all play hide-and-seek. When she returns to the priestess from Bali, she discovers that she has passed her first test.

programme.title: La Petite Pokou - EP 14
programme.desc: Pokou starts her second challenge. N'zi and Lucio advance towards a group of small huts. A little girl comes out of one of the huts and jumps into Lucio's arms.

programme.title: Tout Le Monde Veut Prendre Sa Place
programme.desc: The game where everyone wants to be a winner. One quiz, six candidates and, comfortably installed in his chair, one champion... whom everyone dreams of unseating!

programme.title: Itineraires Paysans - EP 10
programme.desc: The different attitudes and approaches of French farmers in terms of the environment, economy and landscape. A practical way of understanding a region and its terroir through their working practices.

programme.title: Le Journal International
programme.desc: All the national and international news from the TV5MONDE news staff.

programme.title: Sans Frapper
programme.desc: A kaleidoscopic look at the issue of rape, presenting the true story by a victim, Ada, through several voices.

programme.title: Au-Dela Des Murs
programme.desc: One morning, Lina is getting ready to go to Baumettes prison to attend her first visit. Nadjim, her boyfriend, has recently been imprisoned. Before leaving, she gathers things to take to him.

programme.title: A La Poussiere
programme.desc: For the last few months, Fazia has begun her days as a cleaner at the Martin-Pelissards', who are reluctant for her work to be legally declared. Then, one morning, an incident turns into a race against time and a desperate attempt to keep her job.

programme.title: Lebowitz Contre Lebowitz - EP 5
programme.desc: Warnier finds it impossible to go into prison to give his lessons; Paule decides to accompany him, whether he likes it or not. Inside she meets Julien Ocelot and immediately agrees to handle his defence. Irene gets over her depression and regains custody of her son, Paule is devastated.

programme.title: Lebowitz Contre Lebowitz - EP 6
programme.desc: Paule, full of sympathy for Julien for the suffering he's been through, allows her feelings to get the better of her. She falls in love with him. Irene tries to make Paule see reason by pointing out that she's suffering from losing custody of Simon.

programme.title: Meurtres A Amiens
programme.desc: On a canal amidst the ''hortillonnages'', the floating market gardens of Amiens, a lifeless body is found in a Nautilus-shaped fun-fair gondola. Inspector Monet and his assistant Barnier head the investigation. The victim, a seemingly ordinary woman, was apparently threatened ambitious plans for a Jules Verne theme park.

programme.title: Des Racines & Des Ailes - EP 1
programme.desc: From Saint-Paul-de-Vence to the Roya Valley, in the hinterland of Nice, enthusiasts are fighting to promote their territory. By reviving an old perfume house or creating a high-end spirit with small spelt, these artisans are committed to preserving their precious heritage.

programme.title: Destination Francophonie - EP 3
programme.desc: A journey throughout the French-speaking world to explore every corner of the globe! In each country we meet francophones who present, in French, their culture, way of life and commitments. The programme also shines a spotlight on local projects that keep the French language alive, dynamic and constantly evolving.

programme.title: Roumanie, Le Charme Des Balkans
programme.desc: On the southern fringes of Eastern Europe, francophone and francophile, Romania remains little known. Yet, in the heart of its sublime landscapes, its people have succeeded in keeping their culture and traditions alive. From architectural heritage to natural parks, Romania is a land of untold surprises to explore.

programme.title: Movie - A1
programme.desc: Divya, a casteist girl, dreams of marrying a gangster and falls in love with Saravanan without realising that he is from a different caste.

programme.title: Movie
programme.desc: KTV HD presents you round-the-clock Kollywood movies, from the latest blockbusters to classics of the yesteryear!

programme.title: Movie - Sivappu Malli
programme.desc: KTV HD presents you round-the-clock Kollywood movies, from the latest blockbusters to classics of the yesteryear!

programme.title: Movie - Ninaivil Nindraval
programme.desc: A young tourist at a hill station falls in love with her tour guide. When she learns that he was wrongly implicated in a murder case, she tries to help him prove his innocence.

programme.title: Fillers
programme.desc: KTV HD presents you round-the-clock Kollywood movies, from the latest blockbusters to classics of the yesteryear!

programme.title: Movie - Sahadevan Mahadevan
programme.desc: Mahadevan goes to the city in search of a job and meets Sahadevan, an unemployed man who is struggling to pay his dues. The two of them soon become friends and get embroiled in a bizarre situation.

programme.title: Movie - Vidinja Kalyanam
programme.desc: A rich widow plans to get her daughter married. However, the plan goes haywire when a dangerous criminal escapes from the prison and takes refuge in her house.

programme.title: Movie - Vellai Yaanai
programme.desc: Vellai is a farmer from an economically self-sufficient village. But when he and the villagers take a bank's crop loan, they get caught in debt. So a few desperate farmers move to the city in search of jobs. Can they pay off their debt? Or will they give up farming?

programme.title: Movie - Nam Naadu (New)
programme.desc: Muthazhagu, an honest youth leader, opposes his corrupt politician father, Aalavandhar, who aspires to become the chief minister by bullying the villagers.

programme.title: Movie - Sanga Thamizhan
programme.desc: A village protests against plans to build a copper plant due to concerns regarding pollution, but when their leader dies, the company behind the plant sends a look-alike to facilitate their plan.

programme.title: Movie - Jambavaan
programme.desc: Velan, a good-natured villager, learns that his landlord father had adopted him. When he discovers the truth about his biological parents, he sets out end the injustices of a dreaded gangster.

programme.title: Movie - Veeran Veluthambi
programme.desc: Veeran Veluthambi is a 1987 Tamil-language action film directed by Rama Narayanan, starring Vijayakanth and Radha Ravi.

programme.title: Movie - Vengayin Maindhan
programme.desc: Three gangsters rape and kill young women in a village and claim that they were killed by a leopard. The same fate approaches the lady-love of a snake charmer, and he sets out to take revenge on them.

programme.title: Fillers
programme.desc: KTV HD presents you round-the-clock Kollywood movies, from the latest blockbusters to classics of the yesteryear!

programme.title: Movie - Looty
programme.desc: Childless couple Rasappa and Geetha adopt a child abandoned in their car. However, problems ensue when Geetha suspects her husband to be the biological father of the child.

programme.title: Movie - Thoondil
programme.desc: Anjali and Sriram, a happy London-based couple, undergo fertility treatment in order to conceive. Nine years later, Divya, who had donated her eggs, kidnaps the child. She is also Sriram's ex-lover.

programme.title: Movie - Avatharam
programme.desc: Kuppusamy is crazy about acting in theatre. He joins a troupe and falls in love with Ponnama, a blind lady. However, the troupe struggles financially and is disbanded.

programme.title: Movie - Samundi
programme.desc: Samundi and his mother move into a nearby hamlet to live peacefully. Terror strikes them once again through the local goon, who spoiled his sister's life. Will he now exact retribution for the past?

programme.title: Movie - Iruttu
programme.desc: A police officer investigates the mystery behind unnatural deaths after taking charge of his new post at a hill station.

programme.desc: The 2025 World Snooker Championship is a professional snooker tournament organised by the World Snooker Tour and will take place at the Crucible Theatre in Sheffield, England. The winner will receive £500,000 from a total prize fund of £2,395,000. Kyren Wilson is the defending champion and will attempt to to overcome the so-called "Crucible curse", under which no first-time champion has retained the title since the tournament moved to the Crucible Theatre in 1977.

A fascinating insight into the 'move that shook North London'.

programme.title: Liverpool vs Nottingham Forest (MW12) - EP 115
programme.desc: Liverpool lost this exact fixture 1-0 last season, the only league game in which they failed to score all season. They’ve not lost consecutive home league games against Nottingham Forest since 1963.

programme.title: Newcastle United vs Manchester City (MW12) - EP 117
programme.desc: Newcastle United have won just one of their last 35 Premier League meetings with Manchester City (D6 L28), a 2-1 home win in January 2019 under Rafael Benítez.

programme.title: Manchester United vs Everton (MW12) (Live) - EP 120
programme.desc: Manchester United have won 42 Premier League games against Everton, the most wins any side has against another in the competition.

programme.title: FS MMA Chael Sonnen vs. Amar Suloev / Logan Boucher vs. Victor Daychief
programme.desc: BodogFIGHT features classic MMA matches involving some of your favorite fighters! This episode includes Chael Sonnen vs. Amar Suloev and Logan Boucher squaring off with Victor Daychief in British Columbia, Canada.

programme.title: MEGA Fights In 60 Jermain Taylor vs. Jeff Lacy
programme.desc: MEGA Fights are premiere events from the sport of boxing including HBO World Championship Boxing and historic PPV events plus past, current and future World Champions. This episode features former Middleweight Champion Jermain 'Bad Intentions' Taylor (27-2, 17 KOs) in a back and forth battle with Jeff "Left Hook' Lacy (24-1, 17 KOs) in a WBC Super Middleweight Title Eliminator on November 15, 2008 from the Vanderbilt University Memorial Gymnasium in Nashville, Tennessee, USA.

programme.title: Greatest Classics Shane Mosley vs. Manuel Gomez
programme.desc: In this episode, the newly crowned IBF Lightweight World Champion, Shane Mosley, makes the first defense of the title he claimed from Phillip Holiday just three months earlier. He would face a tough competitor in Manuel Gomez of Laredo, Mexico, who would give the new champion a difficult test.

programme.title: KNOCKOUTS! Bernard Hopkins vs. Chad Dawson
programme.desc: The main event in this episode is Bernard Hopkins facing off with Chad Dawson in a light heavyweight championship rematch from their controversial October 2011 bout. Also on the card, action from former welterweight champ James Kirkland.

programme.title: FS Grand Sumo
programme.desc: For the first time the top ranked sumo competitors in the world are featured in an action packed series, FIGHT SPORTS GRAND SUMO. This new format presents Sumo in an authentic, in-depth and entertaining way covering the rules, ranks, match-ups, and more. Show 4 featuring Kakuryu, Shodai, Tochinoshin and Ichinojo from the Haru basho, 2018.

programme.title: XMA
programme.desc: In this episode we focus on the martial art of breaking and how the techniques are fine-tuned with technology.

programme.title: Prison Fighters
programme.desc: This series follows former Muay Thai champion Noy Khaopan and American Cody Moberly, two inmates in a Thailand prison, who after seven years are given the chance to fight for their release. By joining a controversial government modern day Prison Fight program, murderers and felons are given the chance to fight for their freedom, and possible redemption, through the ancient tradition of Muay Thai matches. Episode 1 of 4.

programme.title: MEGA Fights Sergio Gabriel Martinez vs. Serhiy Dzinziruk
programme.desc: This episode features a bout for the vacant WBC diamond middleweight title, as Sergio Gabriel 'Maravilla' Martinez (46-2, 25 KOs) takes on fellow southpaw Serhiy Dzinziruk, aka 'Dzyna Razor' (37-0. 24 KOs). This fight took place from Foxwoods Resort Casino in Mashantucket, Connecticut, USA, on March 12, 2011. Martinez was the reigning Fighter of the Year coming into the fight and vacated his WBC Middleweight title in order to fight the undefeated former champion Dzinziruk.

programme.title: KNOCKOUTS! Shane Mosley vs. Sergio Mora
programme.desc: The main event in this episode is "Sugar" Shane Mosley facing off with Sergio Mora with a highly disputed and controversial decision you will have to see to believe! The two never had a rematch. Also on the card, action from WBC Super Welterweight champ Jermell Charlo.

programme.title: FS Grand Sumo
programme.desc: For the first time the top ranked sumo competitors in the world are featured in an action packed series, FIGHT SPORTS GRAND SUMO. This new format presents Sumo in an authentic, in-depth and entertaining way covering the rules, ranks, match-ups, and more. Show 5 featuring Kaisei, Ikioi, Goeido and Kakuryu from the Haru basho, 2018.

programme.title: BWF Martial Arts
programme.desc: This episode features highlights from the Men's Forms Championships as well as Girl's Weapons, Synchronized Team Forms and Boy's and Girl's Traditional Weapons.

programme.title: Prison Fighters
programme.desc: This series follows former Muay Thai champion Noy Khaopan and American Cody Moberly, two inmates in a Thailand prison, who after seven years are given the chance to fight for their release. By joining a controversial government modern day Prison Fight program, murderers and felons are given the chance to fight for their freedom, and possible redemption, through the ancient tradition of Muay Thai matches. Episode 2 of 4.

programme.title: FIGHT SPORTS MMA Themba Gorimbo vs. Luke Michael
programme.desc: This episode features Themba 'The Answer' Gorimbo and Luke 'Young Gun' Michael battling for the vacant welterweight championship. Vicious ground and pound ends this fight before the end of Round 1. Bonus coverage includes Sizwe Mnikathi vs. August Kayambala.

programme.desc: This episode features Themba 'The Answer' Gorimbo and Luke 'Young Gun' Michael battling for the vacant welterweight championship. Vicious ground and pound ends this fight before the end of Round 1. Bonus coverage includes Sizwe Mnikathi vs. August Kayambala.

programme.title: MEGA Fights Sergio Gabriel Martinez vs. Serhiy Dzinziruk
programme.desc: This episode features a bout for the vacant WBC diamond middleweight title, as Sergio Gabriel 'Maravilla' Martinez (46-2, 25 KOs) takes on fellow southpaw Serhiy Dzinziruk, aka 'Dzyna Razor' (37-0. 24 KOs). This fight took place from Foxwoods Resort Casino in Mashantucket, Connecticut, USA, on March 12, 2011. Martinez was the reigning Fighter of the Year coming into the fight and vacated his WBC Middleweight title in order to fight the undefeated former champion Dzinziruk.

programme.title: KNOCKOUTS! Shane Mosley vs. Sergio Mora
programme.desc: The main event in this episode is "Sugar" Shane Mosley facing off with Sergio Mora with a highly disputed and controversial decision you will have to see to believe! The two never had a rematch. Also on the card, action from WBC Super Welterweight champ Jermell Charlo.

programme.title: FS Grand Sumo
programme.desc: For the first time the top ranked sumo competitors in the world are featured in an action packed series, FIGHT SPORTS GRAND SUMO. This new format presents Sumo in an authentic, in-depth and entertaining way covering the rules, ranks, match-ups, and more. Show 5 featuring Kaisei, Ikioi, Goeido and Kakuryu from the Haru basho, 2018.

programme.title: BWF Martial Arts
programme.desc: This episode features highlights from the Men's Forms Championships as well as Girl's Weapons, Synchronized Team Forms and Boy's and Girl's Traditional Weapons.

programme.title: Prison Fighters
programme.desc: This series follows former Muay Thai champion Noy Khaopan and American Cody Moberly, two inmates in a Thailand prison, who after seven years are given the chance to fight for their release. By joining a controversial government modern day Prison Fight program, murderers and felons are given the chance to fight for their freedom, and possible redemption, through the ancient tradition of Muay Thai matches. programme.desc: Tim explores Rumbleton to find somewhere he can have fun alone. // Tim and Kai try to give Parky the best day ever. // When a storm keeps the Rexes at home they must think of a game to pass the time.

programme.title: Rubble & Crew S2 - EP 216
programme.desc: Rubble & the pups find Grandpa Gravel's lucky bowling ball. Too bad Builder Cove doesn't have a bowling alley... until now! // When a sudden superbloom traps Motor, Lily, and Park Ranger Rose, the pups need a flower-friendly construction solution.

programme.title: Rubble & Crew S2 - EP 203
programme.desc: After the pups discover a new kind of butterfly, it flutters away! Will a giant butterfly garden help bring it back?

programme.title: DORA S2 - EP 210
programme.desc: Dora and Boots help Swiper re-join with his duplicates and make it to Grandma's picnic. / Dora and Boots help Bateo the Bat get to the baseball game in time to play.

programme.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines S7 - EP 701
programme.desc: When Crusher sends Blaze away with one of his latest cheats, Blaze's little sister Sparkle comes to save the day and bring her brother back in time so they can race together to win the Teamwork Trophy!

programme.title: BARBAPAPA - One Big Happy Family! S2 - EP 210
programme.desc: Barbazoo have plenty of things to write about in his diary! // After reading the biography of Nellie Bly, Barbalib is determined to become a Great Reporter!

programme.title: BARBAPAPA - One Big Happy Family! S2 - EP 211
programme.desc: Barbabeau, Barbabelle, and Barbabright have built a treehouse. // Barbamama is determined to stop a foul pollution.

programme.title: Tim Rex in Space S1 - EP 108
programme.desc: Tim tries to be at two parties at once. // Tim tries to find a bogweed free snack for Kai. // After losing again and again, Tia tries to win every party game.

programme.title: DRAGONS 9 REALMS S1 - EP 23
programme.desc: Jun struggles to convince Tom to trust her faith in myths over the Book of Dragons when they venture to a place that his book seems to say is extremely dangerous.

programme.title: DRAGONS 9 REALMS S1 - EP 24
programme.desc: Tom’s leadership abilities come into question by Eugene when his decisions lead to failure while attempting to confront Buzzsaw.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants S1 - EP 13
programme.desc: George and Harold race against Mr. Krupp to try to get him fired before they get expelled

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants S1 - EP 14
programme.desc: In the season opener, George and Harold have returned to school due to a technicality, but the school has been taken over by Melvin and a cyborg Melvin from the future! Their goal is to make the school extremely difficult by replacing all the teachers with Teachertron robots. Suffering under the new regime and without Mr. Krupp/Captain Underpants on hand to help, the boys hypnotize gym teacher Mr. Meaner and turn him into Sergeant Boxers to fight back.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants S1 - EP 15
programme.desc: Tired of the Melvins ruling the school, the boys realize that they need Mr. Krupp to make the school at least bearable. Unfortunately, Krupp has run off to Ecuador to look for a fabled fountain. So the boys form the M.I.S.F.A.R.T.S. - Mega Incredible Search Force Adventure Rescue Team Squad - to travel to Ecuador and bring Krupp back, whether he wants it or not.

programme.title: Gabby's Dollhouse S1 - EP 6
programme.desc: When Gabby unboxes masks and capes for her and Pandy, they become the dollhouse defenders and must save the Gabby Cats from Bad Guy CatRat! In the Gabby Cat of the Day segment, Kitty Fairy sings a song about her garden magic!

programme.title: Gabby's Dollhouse S1 - EP 7
programme.desc: When Gabby unboxes a snow globe shaped like the dollhouse, she notices the rooms inside are all cattywampus and in the wrong place. After a series of wacky misadventures that result in CatRat becoming a craft version of himself, Gabby figures out they need to fix the dollhouse globe to return everything back to normal.

programme.title: Gabby's Dollhouse S1 - EP 8
programme.desc: It’s Game Show Day in the dollhouse! Our wily and well-groomed host, CatRat, leads Gabby and Pandy around the dollhouse, where they compete in Gab-ified games, like Tushy Tunes on the "butt xylophone" couch and a cooking competition of Bakey with Cakey. They win tickets and trade them in for prizes at the end.

programme.title: Gabby's Dollhouse S1 - EP 9
programme.desc: Gabby unboxes a pirate treasure map in the shape of the dollhouse (a piece of it has been torn off). This must mean it’s time for a pirate treasure hunt in the dollhouse! Pirate Gabby and Pirate Pandy head out on their journey across the many "lands" of the dollhouse to find the Gabby Cats Treasure!

programme.title: Gabby's Dollhouse S1 - EP 10
programme.desc: When Gabby unboxes beakers filled with a magical potion, they conjure up an invite for Spa Day at the dollhouse! However, while decorating for MerCat's favorite day of the year, MerCat accidentally loses her color and sparkle. Gabby and Pandy must help her get her sparkle back for the big Spa Day party!

programme.title: Where's Wally? S1 - EP 20
programme.desc: Odlulu wants to get off the naughty list so she goes around the world and tries to "help" celebrations. Unfortunately she does the opposite which means Waldo and Wenda need to clean up her mess to reinstate Christmas!

programme.title: Noddy Toyland Detective S2 - EP 21
programme.desc: While Hoof is about to do his obstacle course, he finds all the fences knocked down. He blames Bling, who was jealous of the lucky wings he wears on his hoofs, but Bling assures she's got nothing to do with it ! Noddy investigates to settle their argument.

programme.title: Noddy Toyland Detective S2 - EP 22
programme.desc: Strange accidents keep happening on the building site. Clockwork Mouse is convinced that someone is trying to stop them finishing the building. Noddy investigates and finds out things aren't quite as they seem...

programme.title: Roary The Racing Car S2 - EP 22
programme.desc: Tin Top is feeling homesick so Big Chris tries to cheer him up. But who could that pesky varmint causing trouble on the track be?!

programme.title: Roary The Racing Car S2 - EP 23
programme.desc: Maxi is jealous of all of James' gadgets, or more precisely, the attention the other cars give him. He persuades Molecom to devise some gadgets for him… with hilarious results

programme.title: Raa Raa the Noisy Lion S2 - EP 21
programme.desc: Raa Raa and his friends are looking for a rumbly noise while Crocky tries to find a quiet spot for a nap.

programme.title: Raa Raa the Noisy Lion S2 - EP 22
programme.desc: Raa Raa and his friends go on a journey driving their vehicles all over the Jingly Jangly Jungle.

programme.title: Gabby's Dollhouse S1 - EP 1
programme.desc: The dollhouse delivery is a spaceship that takes off with a sleeping CatRat inside! Gabby, Pandy, and Kitty Fairy have to get the ship back into The Fairy Tail Garden before Floyd (who thinks it's the best kitty toy ever!) gets his paws on it!

programme.title: Gabby's Dollhouse S1 - EP 2
programme.desc: The dollhouse delivery is a cat-in-the-box that startles Gabby, giving her the hiccups. Dr. Pandy and the Gabby Cats try several cures, but it isn't until CatRat scares the hiccups out of Gabby that they go away!

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants S2 - EP 37
programme.desc: Despite being terrible at the job, Krupp wants to be the camp director again next summer. That's something Harold and George simply cannot abide.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business S2 - EP 38
programme.desc: Finally promoted to CEO, Boss Baby sets his sights on achieving 100% Baby Love, while dealing with the annoying Puppies and Preeks who rented Baby Corp office space while Boss was gone. Tim and Danny become local heroes after saving a baby's life.

programme.title: The Croods Family Tree S1 - EP 15
programme.desc: Eep loves action and adventure - it's in her blood. But when Eep starts adventuring in her sleep, she has to try to find the cause of her new sleep walking to avoid ending up in dangerous situations.

programme.title: DRAGONS 9 REALMS S1 - EP 25
programme.desc: Tom and Thunder discover a baby Nightlight and must bring him back to Thunder’s home realm.

programme.title: Abominable and The Invisible City S1 - EP 17
programme.desc: After their intense battle against Mr. Lung, the Creature Brigade disbands, leaving Yi and Everest as the remaining creature helpers. But thanks to an inert - but magical - chunk of meat called Taisui that falls from the sky, Yi finds herself caught in a time loop, forcing her to return the meat to its rightful home before sundown. Meanwhile, Jin and Peng end up on their own creature mission of sorts. Eventually the crew reunites, and together they are able to return Taisui and end the loop.

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On! S2 - EP 37
programme.desc: Branch is excited to take the Troll children camping with him. But when Guy Diamond arrives at the camp site with "glamping" gear, the kids decide they prefer Guy’s plush method of camping to Branch’s insistence on roughing it./Poppy’s the most amazing gift-giver in Troll Village, and the Snack Pack are determined to finally gift her something as good as her birthday.

programme.title: Gabby's Dollhouse S1 - EP 23
programme.desc: The dollhouse is immersed in imaginative Wild West play with Sheriff Gabby, Sheriff Pandy, and CatRat the Bandit. Sheriff Gabby and Sheriff Pandy must safely deliver gold to the bank, but it gets confiscated by Bandit CatRat! They go on an adventure to get the gold back and restore order in the dollhouse.

programme.title: Gabby's Dollhouse S1 - EP 24
programme.desc: Gabby brings DJ Catnip a microphone for him to use in the big music show, but he has some terrible news: he lost his groove! Determined to help him get his groove back, Gabby and Pandy take him on a musical search through the dollhouse. As they go, Gabby uses the microphone to record sounds from the Gabby Cats’ everyday activities that culminate into a new song that gets DJ his groove back just in time for the show! In our Gabby Cat of the Day Segment, Gabby sings a song!

programme.title: Not Quite Narwhal S1 - EP 21
programme.desc: When one of Rikki’s plants won't sing, Pixie and Juniper both tell their varying recollections of why the plant is suddenly silent. / Kelp, Scallop, and Cruz have always thought that starfish did nothing but laze about; but as they go about their day, the starfish goes through his own routine, completely unbeknownst to everyone else.

programme.title: Not Quite Narwhal S1 - EP 22
programme.desc: Leroy must learn to let go when his caterpillar friend turns into a butterfly. / When Pixie loses her spark, Kelp and Juniper look for the plant they think will cure her. Meanwhile Pixie wonders whether she can be cured at all!

programme.title: Team Zenko Go S1 - EP 7
programme.desc: When Mr. Tanaka adopts an unruly dog at Sam’s behest, the Zenkos have the job of training the mischievous mutt and turning him into man’s best friend material. / When Ellie's friend Maria is late submitting her painting to the art show, it’s up to the Zenkos to get inside the community center after hours, avoiding overzealous junior security Rodney, and get Maria’s painting on display before the show starts.

programme.title: Team Zenko Go S1 - EP 8
programme.desc: After Lula loses her loose tooth in the park, Team Zenko must find the missing molar and get it under Lula’s pillow in time for the Tooth Fairy’s visit. / Gabriel and Luis show off their new drone but it crash lands on the roof top. Team Zenko's mission is to try and get it back, but Yolanda won't give up her new hi-tech friend that easily.

programme.title: Dragons: Rescue Riders S1 - EP 21
programme.desc: Aggro is embarrassed about big changes she's going through. And when she gets stuck in a volcano, the Rescue Riders seek help from ... Magnus?

programme.title: Dragons: Rescue Riders S1 - EP 22
programme.desc: When a mama Ironclaw dragon gets caught high on a mountain with a broken wing, Hannahr the blacksmith has to confront her fear of heights to help out.

programme.desc: Puss gets jealous when Guy Fox shows up and asks Dulcinea to run off with him

programme.desc: When Puss and Dulcinea go on a vacation with all the San Lorenzans tagging along, thieves show up and El Moco takes them captive

programme.desc: The crew teams up with grasshoppers in a fight against devious picnic ants; Turbo goes to great lengths to make somebody on the internet like him.

programme.desc: Wally and Wenda go on a mission to return the borrowed Quick Bloom Key to its owner, an Amazon-dwelling wizard named Vinebeard. But Odlulu intercepts the key so she can use its magic for her lemonade stand. Using local trails, Wally and Wenda must track Odlulu through the jungle. They'll have to raft the Amazon and brave Odlulu's ""living"" plants to complete their mission

programme.title: Where's Wally? S2 - EP 22
programme.desc: Wally, Wenda and Wizard Whitebeard visit a fellow Wizard in Mumbai to take part in a big Bollywood dance number. But when Odlulu uses the Follow-the-Leader Key to lead all the dancers away in order to dance with her, it’s up to the Wanderers to get the key AND the dancers back

programme.title: Noddy Toyland Detective S2 - EP 23
programme.desc: Pat-Pat is doing a magic show but she discovers her magic box is broken. Noddy investigates: Who broke the magic box? He needs to find out soon so that Pat Pat's show can take place.

programme.desc: Armed with a brand new sat-nav from Fuse, the Pirates head off on The Pirate Challenge, sailing all around Toyland. programme.title: Gabby's Dollhouse S1 - EP 4
programme.desc: When Gabby unboxes a school notebook and lunch box, it's Kitty School Day in the dollhouse! Gabby and Pandy head to different classes held by the Gabby Cats to learn and live a day in the life of a student.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants S2 - EP 38
programme.desc: It's parents' weekend at Lake Summer Camp, and Krupp's eager to make amends with Harold and George ... or so he says.

programme.desc: Boss Baby encounters a new threat to Baby Love: an adorable Baby TV show starring Pyg the Pygmy Goat, Tam the Tamandua, and their host Maria-Maria. Boss is told not to go to Corporate War by Board Baby Emiliano, so Boss tries to provoke his enemies to make the first move.

programme.title: The Croods Family Tree S1 - EP 16

programme.desc: When Thunder’s clan of fellow Nightlights is attacked by the Snow Wraith, Tom vows to rescue them.

After some campfire spookiness, the crew comes face-to-face with the actual Yeren, who turns out to be a benevolent, camouflaging creature. The crew and Yeren team up to rejuvenate the campsite and keep it from being shut down.

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On! S2 - EP 38
programme.desc: Guy is running himself ragged trying to be the life of the party for every party in Troll Village. programme.title: Gabby's Dollhouse S1 - EP 25
programme.desc: When Gabby unboxes a recipe for dandelion soup and a soup bowl, she discovers Kitty Fairy is sick! Gabby and Pandy make her some delicious dandelion soup and while she rests, they take care of her Garden. With the help of all the Gabby Cats, they water the Singing Flowers, help the Rainbow Kitty Bushes regain their color, and sing some fussy Itty Bitty Blossoms a lullaby. programme.desc: The dollhouse delivery is a spaceship that takes off with a sleeping CatRat inside! Gabby, Pandy, and Kitty Fairy have to get the ship back into The Fairy Tail Garden before Floyd (who thinks it's the best kitty toy ever!) gets his paws on it!

programme.desc: Kelp and the rest of his friends put on a game of rainbow ball, but Kelp begins to wonder how well his special spark can help him truly measure up to his favorite player. / When the underwater friends meet someone new, they’re reminded that their differences make them unique.

programme.desc: The Community Center's Lost and Found is full and it's up to the gang to use their detective skills and return the lost items to their original owners. / Rodney only needs one more bird on his birdwatching list, but the only problem is that it only comes out at night! Team Zenko must help Rodney face his fear of the dark so he can get the last picture for his collection.

programme.title: Team Zenko Go S1 - EP 10

programme.desc: After Burple and Cutter crash-land in a village of tiny dragons, Burple's unintentional act of courage leads the locals to crown him as their king.

programme.title: Because This Is My First Twenty - EP 2

programme.title: Jason's Table: Masterful Dishes - EP 7

programme.title: Money Movers - EP 1
programme.desc: "Money Movers" provides investors with real-time analysis of the stories and the people attracting the attention of the markets each day. Capturing the energy of day’s early trading, the program includes the breaking news and numbers driving stocks and sectors, helping investors make critical decisions. "Money Movers" anchors speak with the CEOs, government decision-makers and newsmakers who play a relevant role in how money is moving.

programme.title: The Exchange - EP 1

programme.title: Power Lunch - EP 1
programme.desc: CNBC's Kelly Evans and Brian Sullivan take you through the heart of the business day bringing you the latest developments and instant analysis on the stocks and stories driving the day’s agenda. programme.title: Closing Bell - EP 1
programme.desc: Anything can happen between the bells of the trading day. But what happens during the last hour could be what matters most. Hosted by CNBC’s Scott Wapner, "Closing Bell" guides you through the most important hour of the trading day. The show takes a close-up look at how the markets are moving, what’s driving them and how investors are reacting.

programme.title: Closing Bell: Overtime - EP 1
programme.desc: When the bell rings, the action does not end. "Closing Bell: Overtime" takes you through all of the after-hours moves including breaking news, corporate earnings and post-market trading. Big investors, smart strategists and top money managers debate actionable ideas and the big market themes of the day, and get viewers ready for tomorrow’s trading day.

programme.title: Global Business
programme.desc: The flagship business program of CGTN’s English language service. The program offers in-depth analysis of the latest economic data, business trends and market moving policies, zooming in on how all this affects ordinary people. With separate editions out of Asia, Europe, Africa and the Americas, Global Business features analysts and news-makers supported through a global network of correspondents. Global Business shows you what's moving markets in both developed and emerging economies.

programme.title: Africa Live
programme.desc: Africa Live is a news program that focuses on African issues and issues related to this diverse continent. CGTN’s Nairobi-based broadcast center produces Africa Live. Local correspondents and local production teams provide authoritative and in-depth stories from across the region. Africa Live is an objective and comprehensive look at every facet of African life.

programme.title: The World Today
programme.desc: The core rolling news service of CGTN, with regular updates from Beijing, Washington, Nairobi and London, keep viewers up-to-date with all the world’s top stories as they happen. The World Today delivers breaking news, live events, in-depth reporting, expert analysis and sustained coverage.

programme.title: World Insight with Tian Wei
programme.desc: World Insight with Tian Wei is a long-running international platform for debate and intelligent discussion. It is the meeting point of both the highly influential and rising voices, facilitated by host, Tian Wei. Every Monday to Friday, it provides nutrition to form your own thoughts and ideas through live debate and interviews. Live debates linking movers and shakers take place in the signature segment "Global Debate".

programme.desc: The core rolling news service of CGTN, with regular updates from Beijing, Washington, Nairobi and London, keep viewers up-to-date with all the world’s top stories as they happen. programme.title: Dialogue
programme.desc: Dialogue is a prime time daily English talk show on CGTN. The 30-minute talk show covers a wide range of domestic and international topics, providing a balanced and critical perspective on current affairs and analysis within the framework of cross-cultural and multi-disciplinary comparisons. Inviting decision makers in government, business and academia onto the show, the host encourages guests to speak their minds frankly.

programme.desc: The Point with LIU Xin is a current affairs program on CGTN. The program comments on global news through LIU Xin’s very own unique perspective. programme.title: IMPACTS: Climates Change the World "The Amazon Rainforest-- The Threat of Collap
programme.desc: At COP30 in Belem, Brazil, Climate scientist Carlos Nobre warns that if global temperatures rise by 2°C and Amazon deforestation exceeds 20%, the region will cross a tipping point. This irreversible "Amazon Dieback" would turn rainforest into savanna, leading to its disappearance and disrupting global climate. Agroforestry and the international forest restoration funding mechanism TFFF are emerging as key solutions.

programme.title: Drama 10 "Shiba Inu's Rule" Eps. 8
programme.desc: An egoistic magazine editor in his forties finds himself completely alone at work-abandoned by colleagues, with only his Shiba Inu by his side. Inspired by the dog, he proposes a Shiba-themed magazine. Misfits are forced to collaborate, sparking friction and chaos. But through the dog’s gentle gaze, ideas emerge, and broken hearts begin to heal.

programme.title: Night Serial Drama "Hirayasumi" Eps. 14
programme.desc: A warm and bittersweet drama based on the internationally beloved manga by Shinzo Keigo. Ikuta Hiroto (Okayama Amane), 29, has no job, no romantic partner, and none of the usual worries about the future. Drawn to his easygoing personality, a local elderly woman gives him a single-story house. He begins living with his 18-year-old cousin Natsumi (Mori Nana), who has just moved to Tokyo from Yamagata. Before long, people carrying quiet burdens begin to gather around him.

programme.title: Night Serial Drama "Hirayasumi" Eps. 15
programme.desc: A warm and bittersweet drama based on the internationally beloved manga by Shinzo Keigo. Ikuta Hiroto (Okayama Amane), 29, has no job, no romantic partner, and none of the usual worries about the future. Drawn to his easygoing personality, a local elderly woman gives him a single-story house. He begins living with his 18-year-old cousin Natsumi (Mori Nana), who has just moved to Tokyo from Yamagata. Before long, people carrying quiet burdens begin to gather around him.

programme.title: Future Prediction Reflections

programme.title: Big Boys Club
programme.desc: Each episode of Big Boys Club invites singers, artistes as well as people from different walks of life as guests onto the show, participating in relaxed interviews and discussing current trends.

programme.title: The Exorcist's Meter - EP 9
programme.desc: A taxi driver unwittingly releases the curse of a 100-year-old spirit and begins to battle demons.

programme.title: The QUEEN Of News 2 & What's On Today - EP 9
programme.desc: The story tells of anchorwoman Wen Huixin, who leaves SNK News Station and enters into a new competitive news industry landscape, forming a rivalry with Gu Zhaohua and Zhang Jiayan.

programme.title: Lo And Behold - EP 2688
programme.desc: Hung Shu-Kan owns a logistics business. The only thing on his mind is the well-being of his three daughters. His eldest daughter has moved abroad, but his second youngest daughter, Yuek-Shui, is still single. She and her little sister Sum-Yue often squabble, putting their father in a dilemma.

programme.title: Scoop 2025
programme.desc: This programme goes hot on the heels of the biggest happenings in society and the entertainment scene, bringing you the latest scoops.

programme.title: Gourmet Express
programme.desc: Hong Kong is home to gourmet food from all over the world. Our food anchors and hosts keep up with the latest foodie information and offers, gaining an in-depth understanding of the stories behind the taste.

programme.title: Court Lady - EP 3
programme.desc: Sheng Chumu, son of General Sheng Xiaojing, falls in love with Fu Rou, the daughter of an embroidery merchant. Having confirmed their feelings, the two return to Chang'an. Fu Rou soon becomes a female official, and Sheng Chumu is forced to join the army.

programme.title: Big City Shop 2024
programme.desc: Big City Shop introduces viewers to the latest products on fashion, skin care, make-up, health care, baby care and much more! The hosts will demonstrate and try on the products, and also invite related experts to share their knowledge.

programme.title: Happy Old Buddies
programme.desc: This show brings on doctors and Chinese medicine practitioners to discuss diseases that the elderly should pay attention to, and provide prevention and treatment methods.

programme.title: News Treasury 2024
programme.desc: News Treasury takes everyone to uncover news from the treasure house. In addition to past specials, live broadcasts and reports, there are also precious clips from iconic events that have never been exposed.

programme.title: Scoop 2025
programme.desc: This programme goes hot on the heels of the biggest happenings in society and the entertainment scene, bringing you the latest scoops.

programme.title: Good Morning Hong Kong and Global View
programme.desc: Good Morning Hong Kong brings you the latest news that matter to you.

programme.title: The Exorcist's Meter - EP 10

programme.title: Golden City (Ep 751-800) VVD Mandarin - EP 760
programme.desc: Set in the 60s in Jioufen, the story tells how three sworn brothers conquer the world with their bare hands. While connecting romance from the previous generation to the shared emotions with the present, the drama explores differences in generational values.

programme.title: My Perfect Stranger - EP 9
programme.desc: The story depicts a strange and beautiful story of time travel between Yoon Hae Jun (Kim Dong Wook) who seeks the truth behind a murder case, and Baek Yoon Young (Jin Ki Joo) who wants to prevent the marriage of her parents while getting trapped in year 1987.

programme.title: The Litchi Road - EP 33
programme.desc: [With English and Chinese subtitles] Adapted from the same-name novel, the drama features a minor official, Li Shande (Lei Jia Yin), during the Tang Dynasty. He overcomes numerous hardships and travels thousands of miles to deliver lychees from Gaozhou in Lingnan to Chang’an.

programme.title: Lo And Behold - EP 2088
programme.desc: This story revolves around the Hung family, their working lives and friends.

programme.title: Prism Breaker - EP 15
programme.desc: [With English and Chinese subtitles] After coming round, Chow Chun-kit realizes he is trapped in a huge iron cage. Other people are also locked up. Ko Ho-yin interrogates Szema Kwan’s subordinate Chief Superintendent Luk Wing-tung, who is suspected of taking some bribe and doing favor for someone.

programme.title: The Wanted Detective - EP 22
programme.desc: [With English and Chinese subtitles] On his wedding day, Xiao Bei Ming (Wang Xing Yue), the best detective of Qi, was framed as a demon and fled into the lake on the charge of murdering his master and treason. Three years later, he returned and joins a group of witty partners to seek justice.

programme.title: Lo And Behold - EP 2088
programme.desc: This story revolves around the Hung family, their working lives and friends.

programme.title: The Heir to the Throne (with Eng Subs) - EP 20
programme.desc: Chi-lam’s silk scarf is floating beside a yacht. Chi-bun promptly torches it. And he recalls the sequence of events in the evening when the incident took place. Ko Tsun brings along the DNA report, which was sent to him by Chi-lam, and questions Ko Sing. Ko Sing comes clean about himself and Ka-pik being Chi-lam’s parents.

programme.desc: Set in the 60s in Jioufen, the story tells how three sworn brothers conquer the world with their bare hands. While connecting romance from the previous generation to the shared emotions with the present, the drama explores differences in generational values.

programme.title: The Limbo - EP 2
programme.desc: As the New Year approaches, an unexpected subsidence accident occurs at the old department store, Luobai Mall, in Haizhou City, trapping 13 people underground. This race against time and for survival becomes a profound test of humanity, morality, and faith...

programme.title: The Limbo - EP 3
programme.desc: As the New Year approaches, an unexpected subsidence accident occurs at the old department store, Luobai Mall, in Haizhou City, trapping 13 people underground. This race against time and for survival becomes a profound test of humanity, morality, and faith...

programme.title: The Litchi Road - EP 33
programme.desc: [With English and Chinese subtitles] Adapted from the same-name novel, the drama features a minor official, Li Shande (Lei Jia Yin), during the Tang Dynasty. He overcomes numerous hardships and travels thousands of miles to deliver lychees from Gaozhou in Lingnan to Chang’an.

programme.title: Sinister Beings 2 - EP 23
programme.desc: Due to some rare allergic reaction, Tin-cho falls into a coma. Chun-sum and Wai-lik find out the fire is suspicious. They deduce that it has something to do with Perses and the mercenary group. Wing-sze is so remorseful that she approaches Cheung Hei and apologizes to her. Cheung Hei does not want to hold Wing-sze accountable.

programme.title: Golden City (Ep 751-800) VVD Mandarin - EP 761

programme.title: The Litchi Road - EP 34

programme.title: Prism Breaker - EP 16
programme.desc: [With English and Chinese subtitles] After Chow Chun-kit wins the contest, Tai Cho-fuk allows him to see Ho Tin-yu. Chow Chun-kit finds out Ho Tin-yu is alive and pregnant, so he is even more determined to flee Sea Fortress with his wife. Tai Cho-fuk livestreams abusing Chow Chun-kit and Ho Tin-yu to make money, and Tai Wing-keung is even more tired of living with Tai Cho-fuk.

programme.title: The Wanted Detective - EP 23
programme.desc: [With English and Chinese subtitles] On his wedding day, Xiao Bei Ming (Wang Xing Yue), the best detective of Qi, was framed as a demon and fled into the lake on the charge of murdering his master and treason. Three years later, he returned and joins a group of witty partners to seek justice.

programme.title: Lo And Behold - EP 2089
programme.desc: This story revolves around the Hung family, their working lives and friends.

programme.title: The Heir to the Throne (with Eng Subs) - EP 21
programme.desc: Ko Tsun goes to Chi-bun’s yacht and the area near the marina to look for evidence, but he finds nothing. While paying his respects to his late mother, Ko Tsun catches sight of auntie telling Ko Sing off. He then finds out the inside story about his mother’s death. Chi-bun wants to marry Gigi. Both families discuss the wedding over a meal.

programme.title: Sinister Beings 2 - EP 24

Kwun-fung is influenced by Wing-sze’s easy-going character. Kwun-fung gets jealous as Cheung Hei tells him Chun-sum still thinks of Wing-sze. Chun-sum runs into Wing-sze.

programme.title: Prism Breaker - EP 17
programme.desc: [With English and Chinese subtitles] Although Ho Tin-yu is on the run, but she chooses to go back to save Chow Chun-kit. And Choi Pui-man is eventually killed as she wants to distract the pursuers. Meanwhile, Ding Siu-fei manages to retaliate against the pursuers. He also puts on the pursuer’s clothes.

programme.title: The Wanted Detective - EP 24
programme.desc: [With English and Chinese subtitles] On his wedding day, Xiao Bei Ming (Wang Xing Yue), the best detective of Qi, was framed as a demon and fled into the lake on the charge of murdering his master and treason. programme.title: Lo And Behold - EP 2090
programme.desc: This story revolves around the Hung family, their working lives and friends.

programme.title: The Heir to the Throne (with Eng Subs) - EP 22
programme.desc: Ho-yee cannot leave the past behind. Ko Tsun feels depressed as he knows she regards him as a buddy. Yau’s has financial issues and Yau’s bonds are not selling well as Datuk withdraws from the casino project. Ho-yee brings up the topic of allowing Yau’s to collaborate with Chiu on the condition that she becomes Yau’s CEO with Lai-kei as the Chairperson of the foundation.

programme.title: Golden City (Ep 751-800) VVD Mandarin - EP 762
programme.desc: Set in the 60s in Jioufen, the story tells how three sworn brothers conquer the world with their bare hands. While connecting romance from the previous generation to the shared emotions with the present, the drama explores differences in generational values.

programme.title: Gods Of Honour - EP 6
programme.desc: NAR JAR (CHAN HO MAN, BENNY) was a ‘Fire master’ in his previous life. He was killed by LEE CHING (YUEN WAH). After reincarnation, he ironically becomes CHING’s third son. He is very much affected by his old memories and cannot forgive his father. CHING also keeps his distance from him because of his exotic nature and eventually sends him away with excuses. Luckily, he is saved by some kind people and becomes a General when he is still a teenager.

programme.title: Just Love - EP 15
programme.desc: Judge KO HEI MAN (HSUAN JESSICA HESTER) and KOT KWOK KWONG (CHAN KAM HUNG, SUNNY) have agreed that MAN will concentrate on her career while KWONG will be taking care of the housework after they get married. Everything is in harmony until KWONG’s father discovers MAN and KWONG’s pre-marriage written agreement. Their relationship complicates ever since._x000D__x000D_ To make things worse, KWONG breaks the agreement and demands to have his own career.

programme.title: Get On A Flat - EP 11
programme.desc: Rewind to the 2008 financial crisis and supermarket manager Che Chi-ming (Andrew Lam) hurriedly sells his apartment. Who could have known even though Chi-ming has been chasing after property prices for 14 years, he still cannot get on the property ladder once again. A middle class lifestyle is tragically transformed into a "midlife crisis"._x000D__x000D_Chi-ming’s wife Man Wai (Elena Kong) is obsessed with property ownership. She goes to work as a part-time maid at some luxury home.

programme.title: Fist Within Four Walls, A - EP 20
programme.desc: CHOR AU-KUEN (Ruco Chan) bears the grief of the loss of his family and returns to the walled city in hopes of finding his long lost sister, only to find out that the place he grew up in has become a lawless no man's land. Concealing his real identity as a Bajiquan master, he creates a new identity and gets acquainted with a feisty hair salon lady boss, TIU LAN (Nancy Wu), a dentist, DUEN YING-FUNG (Benjamin Yuen), and a worker, BUT TAK-LIU (Lam Tsz Sin).

programme.title: Silver Spoon, Sterling Shackles - EP 30
programme.desc: During the 1930s in Hong Kong, where east meets west, feminist activists started campaigning for women's rights, seeking to uproot the phenomenon of men's superiority over women. Though having studied abroad in England and leading a western lifestyle, CHUNG CHEUK-MAN (Damian Lau) , a well-known Chinese barrister, is very traditional indeed.

Though having studied abroad in England and leading a western lifestyle, CHUNG CHEUK-MAN (Damian Lau) , a well-known Chinese barrister, is very traditional indeed.

programme.title: Gods Of Honour - EP 7
programme.desc: NAR JAR (CHAN HO MAN, BENNY) was a ‘Fire master’ in his previous life. He was killed by LEE CHING (YUEN WAH). After reincarnation, he ironically becomes CHING’s third son. He is very much affected by his old memories and cannot forgive his father. CHING also keeps his distance from him because of his exotic nature and eventually sends him away with excuses. Luckily, he is saved by some kind people and becomes a General when he is still a teenager.

programme.title: Just Love - EP 16
programme.desc: Judge KO HEI MAN (HSUAN JESSICA HESTER) and KOT KWOK KWONG (CHAN KAM HUNG, SUNNY) have agreed that MAN will concentrate on her career while KWONG will be taking care of the housework after they get married. Everything is in harmony until KWONG’s father discovers MAN and KWONG’s pre-marriage written agreement. Their relationship complicates ever since._x000D__x000D_ To make things worse, KWONG breaks the agreement and demands to have his own career.

programme.title: Get On A Flat - EP 12
programme.desc: Rewind to the 2008 financial crisis and supermarket manager Che Chi-ming (Andrew Lam) hurriedly sells his apartment. Who could have known even though Chi-ming has been chasing after property prices for 14 years, he still cannot get on the property ladder once again. A middle class lifestyle is tragically transformed into a "midlife crisis"._x000D__x000D_Chi-ming’s wife Man Wai (Elena Kong) is obsessed with property ownership. She goes to work as a part-time maid at some luxury home.

programme.title: Fist Within Four Walls, A - EP 21
programme.desc: CHOR AU-KUEN (Ruco Chan) bears the grief of the loss of his family and returns to the walled city in hopes of finding his long lost sister, only to find out that the place he grew up in has become a lawless no man's land. Concealing his real identity as a Bajiquan master, he creates a new identity and gets acquainted with a feisty hair salon lady boss, TIU LAN (Nancy Wu), a dentist, DUEN YING-FUNG (Benjamin Yuen), and a worker, BUT TAK-LIU (Lam Tsz Sin).

programme.title: Silver Spoon, Sterling Shackles - EP 32
programme.desc: During the 1930s in Hong Kong, where east meets west, feminist activists started campaigning for women's rights, seeking to uproot the phenomenon of men's superiority over women. Though having studied abroad in England and leading a western lifestyle, CHUNG CHEUK-MAN (Damian Lau) , a well-known Chinese barrister, is very traditional indeed.
